application_instruction: Note: By applying to this position your application is automatically submitted to the following locations: Sunnyvale, CA, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA; Reston, VA, USA; Austin, TX, USA; Atlanta, GA, USA; New York, NY, USA
description:
The Google Cloud Platform team helps customers transform and evolve their business through the use of Google’s global data center and software products. As a Value Engineering consultant in this rapidly growing business, you will help shape the future of how technology is used in the workplace.

In this role, you will engage with our largest customers and prospects to share how Google Cloud products, solutions, and services can have a positive impact on their businesses, developing methodologies to predict business and technical value and sharing insights collected from the later revision of these measurements.

Google Cloud helps millions of employees and organizations empower their employees, serve their customers, and build what’s next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are engineered for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. And our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • MBA or equivalent practical experience in financial modeling and developing NPV, IRR, and Payback models.
  • 8 years of experience in Finance, Sales, Consulting, or Industry Solutions, including management consulting with an international firm.
  • Experience with the technology and cloud computing market.
  • Experience managing finance executive stakeholders.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience navigating complexity and delivering value with minimal resource and direction.
  • Knowledge of value selling methodologies and processes, opportunities, value chain, and value realization across cloud technology.
  • Ability to effectively operate with enthusiasm and flexibility in a fast-paced, constantly evolving team environment.
  • Passion for Google Cloud products (e.g., G Suite, Google Cloud Platform).
  • Excellent verbal, written, and formal presentation communication skills.
responsibilities:
• Consult on business value creation and implementation processes, including the development of business use cases that help create a value-based strategy for technology sales.
  • Track and capture economic realization data for use in current and future programs.
  • Write and publish white papers highlighting the financial benefits of Google Cloud Platform based on real world client experience.
title: Value Consultant, Google Cloud
